ygData.subject: spells
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yeah, it s not completely useless, better than nothing.  The Halo of Light spell would be better for you later on.  Especially when you die somewhere and
ygData.messageBody:
Mike Calhoun wrote:
>
>>From: Mike Calhoun <ninxf@...>
>
>>Nah I am a Wizard from Erudin. That spell gave off almost no light.
>

>Well, it's better than nothing, and it's free and it's more than other
>classes that can't cast it got, so why complain about it?

Yeah, it's not completely useless, better than nothing. The Halo of Light
spell would be better for you later on. Especially when you die somewhere
and you are in need of light on the fly. I hear you Erudites are
particularly feeble in the dark. ;) Bwaaahahaah. (my attempt to feel
superior to your overinflated INT. :)

Anyway, anybody have a guess what the fair market value of a water crystal
staff is? I got a spare one lying around and I want to use it for trade...

-- Lim'Dul
